name: Gone (krownlesKing)
description:
You are lost on an unknown planet, with no knowledge while Alice your A.I. assistance, help you through your mission, you are meet the the hallucination and fear, of being lost and forgotten, while you encounter sample that try to make you see the truth or simply stray from the truth, while there are lost captain logs that try to make you remember who you are and regain your memory.

(game play: less than 20 minutes.)

controllers is WASD.

Interact with objects is spacebar.

To get out of full screen is F12 during the actual game play.

exit the game is F4 during the actual game play.
